resources.string: This is droidVNC-NG %1$s. Please note that more features are still being added to droidVNC-NG. In particular, keyboard handling as of now can only be done via the Android soft keyboard, there is no support for keyboard events from VNC viewers (yet). Please report any issues and feature requests at https://github.com/bk138/droidVNC-NG

This allows droidVNC-NG to post input events to the Android operating system, thus allowing remote control from a connected VNC viewer. All entered input is directly posted to Android, no input is logged, saved or shared.
To be able to remotely control your device, you need to enable accessibility for droidVNC-NG. Do you want to enable accessibility now?
Could not find the default accessibility settings activity. Please configure accessibility settings manually.
To be able to transfer files to and from your device, you need to enable file access for droidVNC-NG. Do you want to enable file access now?
